title: Magical Weapons - Combat Sounds
description: 322 high-quality weapon sounds that will make your battles awesome!
longDescription:
Magical Weapons - Combat Sounds

322 high-quality weapon sounds (158 as the standard version and 164 with an echo enhancement to make the sound more interesting). You can alter the pitch to generate even more sounds from the source files provided in this pack.


🔊 YouTube Link (hear the audio preview of the 322 SFX)

📜  Tracklist PDF


There are 28 different types of weapons inside the pack:

Airy, Anime, Big Weapon, Crystal Magic, Double Hit, Earth, Energy Sparks, Ethereal, Explosive, Fantasy, Fire, Funny, Futuristic, Glass, Hardcore, Hit Mark, Holy, Ice, Laser, Dagger, Mechanical, Melodic, Robotic, Shadow, Thin, Thunder, Water, Wind


Check all our packs!


More about the pack:

- Editable: Easy to generate more sounds if you alter pitch.

- Intuitive file naming.

- Very easy to implement in your game.

- Put more life to your game with this weapons SFX.


*Bridge plugin is enabled
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 322

Number of Audio Cues: 322

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 16 minutes and 09 seconds
